quoteText:
Nabu Casa, Inc.
visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before using Nabu Casa, Inc.’s websites, with the drawback that certain features of Nabu Casa, Inc.’s websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.
title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service
